Radoslaw Swiat - Frontend Developer

About me

I'm a developer with ~9 years experience.
I'm a self learner from the start to the end.
Programming is my passion, Law is my degree.
I'm highly self motivated with 'can do' attitude even when something exceed my current knowledge.

Interesting fact about me: I've started my programming as a Neverwinter Nights scripter ( aurora engine )

Pros

  • Never giving up
  • Fast learning
  • Can do attitude
  • Good debugging skills
  • Good 'how it works' skill
  • Passioned about code architecture
  • Love to teach others
  • Can do things quickly

Performance dashboard

It was created with people from BT for one of the London Javascript Meetups
I wrote node, express, sockets code as well as react and vue implementation.

E2E tests without programming skills

GUI for protractor to create e2e tests

It's express socket.io application build over protractor.js
Gui written in angular 1

Features:
- live content updates due to socket.io
- user management
- tests creation/management/running/logs etc
- tests schedules
- ability to create custom modules

ThreeJS seeded world algorithm

ThreeJS cube world with a seeded world generator algorithm.

It takes seed and a noise to generate random world. Algorithm has to be improved and some performance improvements has still to be done.

Mario game - no frameworks

This was a Christmas Card for other departments.

No framework - as its always important to understand the framework before using one, and that is no better way to do it then just by writing game without it.

There is also a 2 player's game, but it has been disabled.
